name: One Frame Sword
description:
Try to return from the inside of the mountain, reclaiming the One Frame Sword from its guardians

CONTROLS:

MOVEMENT: WASD/Arrows/DPAD
INSPECT: Mouse/Right stick
ATTACK/MENU CONFIRM: E/Bottom face button
DROP ITEM/MENU CANCEL: Q/Right face button
ACTIVATE BREAK: Shift/Left face button
CHANGE PLAYBACK SPEED: Space/Top face button
QUIT GAME: Escape
Toggle CRT filter: C

Drop/Pick up gear:

Drop - Press DROP ITEM to open the DROP menu, then select the gear you want to drop, and press MENU CONFIRM to drop it.
Pick up - With the inventory spot of the item you want emptied (Helmet/Chestplate/Greaves/Boots/Weapon), walk over the item and it will be automatically picked up and equipped.

BREAK mode:

You can activate BREAK mode when your BREAK bar fills to 100%. By activating BREAK, you become invincible to attacks, but the only action you can take while it's active is movement. Lasts for 100 frames, refills when dealing/receiving damage.

Item Display Legend (XX YY ZZ numbers on in game inspector):

Armour: XX (Defense) YY (Additional movement startup) ZZ (Additional movement recovery)

Weapon: XX (Startup) YY (Active frames) ZZ (Recovery)

V1.1: switched to GLES2 for greater compatibility
V1.2: Removed DVORAK inputs because they overlapped with the QWERTY inputs, causing issues when playing on the latter
